newsArray.title: Ahead of Duleep Trophy, Jay Shah encourages players to...
creator: TOI Sports Desk
newsArray.description: The BCCI will kick off its 2024-25 domestic cricket season with the Duleep Trophy starting on September 5th, 2024. Featuring four teams, this red-ball tournament serves as a key preparation platform for players ahead of a busy international Test schedule. Matches are set to take place in Anantapur and Bengaluru.

newsArray.description: Soccer AM finished last year after 30 years on our TV screens, but Mail Podcasts are getting the old gang back together. A new podcast has launched fronted by Tim Lovejoy and Helen Chamberlain.

newsArray.title: PCB Regional Inter-District senior tournament to commence on Thursday
creator: shahzad.malik
newsArray.description: The Regional Inter-District senior cricket tournament is set to commence on Thursday, 5 September in six regions across the country including Abbottabad, Bahawalpur, Hyderabad, Karachi, Multan and Sialkot Regions. Meanwhile, the tournament will kick off on 8 September in eight other regions including Azad Jammu and Kashmir (AJK), Dera Murad Jamali, FATA, Faisalabad, Islamabad, Larkana, [...]The post PCB Regional Inter-District senior tournament to commence on Thursday appeared first on ASports.tv.

creator: News18 Hindi
newsArray.description: एमएस धोनी को हमेशा अपने साथी खिलाड़ियों की मदद करते देखा जाता है. लेकिन क्या आप यकीन करेंगे कि मैदान पर ऐसे भी कई मौके आए हैं जब कैप्टन कूल ने अपने ही गेंदबाजों की मदद करने से इनकार कर दिया.

newsArray.title: ટીમ ઈન્ડિયાના ખેલાડીઓ માટે આદેશ જારી, બાંગ્લાદેશ સામે ટેસ્ટ સિરીઝ પહેલા કરવું પડશે આ કામ
creator: Smit Chauhan
newsArray.description: ભારત અને બાંગ્લાદેશ વચ્ચે 19 સપ્ટેમ્બરથી બે મેચની ટેસ્ટ શ્રેણી રમાશે. BCCIએ હજુ સુધી આ શ્રેણી માટે ટીમ ઈન્ડિયાની જાહેરાત કરી નથી. આ દરમિયાન ખેલાડીઓ માટે ઓર્ડર જારી કરવામાં આવ્યો છે.

newsArray.title: T20I Cricket: ডিআরএস ছাড়াই আন্তর্জাতিক সিরিজ! অভিষেক DC-র বিধ্বংসী ওপেনারের
creator: TV9 Bangla
newsArray.description: Scotland vs Australia T20I DRS: প্রথম টি-টোয়েন্টিতে এটা যেমন আলোচনার বিষয়, তেমনই আরও একটা রয়েছে। ইন্ডিয়ান প্রিমিয়ার লিগের গত সংস্করণে বিধ্বংসী ব্যাটিং দেখা গিয়েছিল এক তরুণ ক্রিকেটারের। হঠাৎই সুযোগ, দুর্দান্ত পারফরম্যান্স। এ বার আন্তর্জাতিক ক্রিকেটেও অভিষেক হল দিল্লি ক্যাপিটালসের সেই ওপেনারের।
